m_szDocTitle: Apple Earnings: A Closer Look At What the Numbers Mean - NASDAQ.com
m_szDocSumamry: Apple Earnings: A Closer Look At What the Numbers Mean January 27, 2016, 08:33:53 AM EDT By Prableen Bajpai Comment Shutterstock photo Apple ( AAPL ) released its Q1 2016 earnings, which covers the period from October to December. The company posted a record quarterly revenue of $75.87 billion and record quarterly net income of $18.4 billion or $3.28 per diluted share. The revenue showed 2% increase as compared to the year-ago quarter (Q1 2015) and 47% increase as compared to the previous quarter (Q4 2015). The earnings per share (EPS) rose by 7.19% year-on-year while the EPS jumped up by 66.5
